about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Wellness through ancestral techniques
about.description:
Mali Spa is a space dedicated to integral care. Our therapies combine ancestral knowledge with attentive and present listening, respecting the unique rhythm of each person who arrives.

We believe that true wellness is born from the balance between body, mind, and spirit. That's why each session is designed to provide not only relaxation, but an experience of reconnection with yourself.
